sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import Input from '../../Components/UI/Input/Input'
import MainBtn from '../../Components/UI/MainBtn/MainBtn'
import useValue from '../../hooks/useValue'

const Registration = ({ inputStyles, btnStyles }) => {
  const [registration, setRegistration] = useValue({ Email: '', Password: '' })

  return (
    <form className='auth__form'>
      <Input type='text' style={inputStyles} placeholder='E-mail' />
      <Input type='password' style={inputStyles} placeholder='Create password' />
      <MainBtn type='submit' styles={btnStyles}>
        Create account
      </MainBtn>
    </form>
  )
}

export default Registration
